description: Describes the specified bundle tasks or all of your bundle tasks.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: The DescribeBundleTasks API call can provide details about the instance, which can be used to gather information about the system's configuration and status. The description of what a Bundle Task is not even available on AWS anymore.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.technique: T1553.002 - Subvert Trust Controls: Code Signing
unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: nsuring that the bundled data is from a legitimate source and not tampered with might involve code signing, particularly if the bundle is intended for deployment or transfer. The description of what a Bundle Task is not even available on AWS anymore.

The bundling process involves staging data for bundling and transfer, which is a crucial step in the data management process. The description of what a Bundle Task is not even available on AWS anymore.

incidents.description: Compromised Cloud Compute Credentials: Case Studies From the Wild

securityImplications: Attackers might use DescribeBundleTasks to gain insights into the bundling tasks of EC2 instances.
